sentences.sContent: Big extinct birds such as the giant moa,thunderbirds and elephant birds all left eggshells behind them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Big extinct birds such as the giant moa,thunderbirds and elephant birds all left eggshells behind them.
sentences.sCn: 像恐鸟、雷鸟和象鸟这样已经灭绝的鸟类都留下了它们的蛋壳化石。

sentences.sContent: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.sCn: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

phrases.pCn: 白象，灰色象（在印度、东南亚被视为神圣之物）；无价值的东西

trans.tranOther: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up
